rubrics.rubric: Loss of memory with confusion about daily tasks and surroundings
Forgets names, words, or recent events but remembers the past clearly
Talks incoherently, asks same question repeatedly
rubrics.notes: Mid to late dementia; frontal disconnection

rubrics.rubric: Emotionally dull, indifferent and doesn't recognize relatives

advanced_additions.rubric: Dementia with suspicion, jealousy, and delusion of being watched
advanced_additions.notes: Paranoid dementia stage, common in frontal or mixed-type

advanced_additions.rubric: Dementia with emotional coldness, apathy, and social withdrawal
advanced_additions.notes: Flat affect in Alzheimer’s, frontal dementia, advanced aging

advanced_additions.rubric: Dementia with childish behavior, talking like a child
Forgetfulness for names and words, especially under stress
advanced_additions.notes: Early cognitive fatigue and stress-related word block

advanced_additions.rubric: Dementia after stroke, injury, or shock to the system
Dementia in perfectionist, over-disciplined, emotionally suppressed constitutions
advanced_additions.notes: Emotional rigidity leading to slow degeneration

advanced_additions.rubric: Wandering behavior with disorientation in familiar settings
advanced_additions.notes: Moderate to advanced dementia wandering episodes

advanced_additions.rubric: Dementia with obsessive behavior, repeated phrases or acts
advanced_additions.notes: Overlap with obsessive aging patterns or mixed dementia

final_additions.rubric: Dementia with tendency to laugh or weep without cause
final_additions.notes: Frontal lobe damage with pseudo-bulbar affect (emotional incontinence)

final_additions.rubric: Dementia with slowness in comprehension and delayed answers
final_additions.notes: Mental dullness and hesitation in responding

final_additions.rubric: Dementia in timid, childlike patients afraid of being alone
final_additions.notes: Early dementia in shy, dependent constitutions

final_additions.rubric: Dementia with restlessness, pacing, and compulsive movement
final_additions.notes: Frontal or mixed-type dementia with pacing, OCD-like actions

final_additions.rubric: Dementia with delusions of poverty or being deserted
final_additions.notes: Emotional despair and self-worth loss in dementia

final_additions.rubric: Dementia from long-term alcoholism with trembling, memory loss
final_additions.notes: Wernicke–Korsakoff-like rubrics in degenerative alcohol cases

final_additions.rubric: Dementia in artistic, sensitive constitutions who collapse mentally
final_additions.modality: < emotional suppression, < failed love, > calm nature
final_additions.notes: Burned-out idealistic types with creative suppression
